name: minions-jobs-workspace
description: Canonical schemas for job postings and extracted signals across freelance platforms
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-jobs/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-jobs/cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-jobs-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-jobs-blog run build && pnpm --filter minions-jobs-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter minions-jobs-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-jobs-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter minions-jobs-web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-jobs/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-jobs/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-jobs/cli run lint
